item.title: goddamn i rule.
item.description:
i had no idea how much i rule until derek pointed it out to me: Derek Brooks: i found a better google search Home Aim: yea? Derek Brooks: google search Derek Brooks: 2 hundred and 9 fucking results
Thats right… i rule.
